narrative.inOrderTo: communicate effectively to the business some functionality

scenario.title: A scenario is a collection of executable steps of different type

steps.string: Given the user is on etsy home page
When the user search the shoes
Then the user land on shoes section page

performableStory.localizedNarrative: In order to communicate effectively to the business some functionality As a development team I want to use Behaviour-Driven Development

scenario.title: A scenario is a collection of executable steps of different type

steps.string: Given the user is on etsy home page
When the user search the shoes
Then the user land on shoes section page

scenario.title: A scenario is a collection of executable steps of different type

steps.string: Given the user is on etsy home page
When the user search the shoes
Then the user land on shoes section page
Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'
Then they should see the definition 'A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'
Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'pear'
Then they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'

performableStory.localizedNarrative: In order to talk better As a n English student I want to look up word definitions

steps.string: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'
Then they should see the definition 'A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'
